params.name: visitContext
params.description: data to be passed between operations

params.name: operation
params.description: an operation to be performed on the AST node and visitContext

params.name: postoperation
params.description: operation to be performed after visiting the current node

params.name: contentOwner
params.description: a unique identifier of the content owner (e.g. file full name) for validatation purposes
